name: VIPERTRACE
description:
Fight for survival! Industrial waste has disturbed the dangerous Kaeru-tori's habitat, forcing them into the city. Unlock new areas, purchase weapons and upgrades to grow stronger, and fight off the horde with your friends!

VIPERTRACE is the latest game from Coin Flip Studios made with their own in-house engine VOLT. Fight off endless waves of vicious Kaer-toris that's after your blood! Play alone or with a friend using LAN and try to get the best high score!

VIPERTRACE has several unique mechanics never seen before! Such as:
    [*Guns!*Enemies trying to kill you!*Score!*Progression!*Scripted Event!*And more!]

DISCLAIMER!
This game is a school project made by students from The Game Assembly in Malmoe as part of our education. It's the last project before internship and is made entirely in an in-house engine developed by the group's programmers. The goal was to choose an existing game as a reference and recreate our own take on it. For VIPERTRACE we chose Call of Duty: Black Ops, Zombie mode.
